entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain early in the evening. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
